CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Post-Harvest stage positioned above or below the Total Harvested Crop stage?
SRP.A: The Post-Harvest stage is positioned {below} the Total Harvested Crop stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Delivered to Retail?
VE.A: The value of stage Delivered to Retail is {2541}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Purchased by Consumers?
VE.A: The value of stage Purchased by Consumers is {2033}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Total Harvested Crop, with a value of {13364}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Purchased by Consumers, with a value of {2033}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail?
SC.A: Decreased by {0} Tons from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {1302} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Total Harvested Crop to stage Post-Harvest?
SC.A: Decreased by {4761} Tons from stage Total Harvested Crop to stage Post-Harvest.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 7211? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Total Harvested Crop} stage has {13364}, the {Post-Harvest} stage has {8603}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 3192? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {2541}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {2541}, the {Purchased by Consumers} stage has {2033}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2541 and 4831? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {3843}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {2541}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {2541}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Total Harvested Crop to Post-Harvest, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Total Harvested Crop} to {Post-Harvest} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Delivered to Retail to Purchased by Consumers, from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection, or from stage Total Harvested Crop to Post-Harvest?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Total Harvested Crop} to stage {Post-Harvest} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Total Harvested Crop} and {Post-Harvest} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Packaged for Distribution} and {Delivered to Retail} stages.
